text: The 1932 Summer Olympics, officially known as Games of the X Olympiad, were held in Los Angeles, United States.Sports Reference.com (SR/Olympics), "1932 Los Angeles Summer Games" ; retrieved 2012-7-24. U.S. President Herbert Hoover did not attend the games. Despite this snub, the games were thought to be a success because the LA Olympics did not end up in debt.Zarnowski, C. Frank. "A Look at Olympic Costs," Citius, Altius, Fortius (US). Summer 1992, Vol. 1, Issue 1, p. 21 [6 of 17 PDF]; retrieved 2012-7-24. Los Angeles was the first to provide an athletes' "village". ==Participating nations== A total of 37 nations sent athletes to compete at the Los Angeles games.Taking part in the games for the first time were Colombia and the Republic of China * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes ==References == ==Other websites== * IOC page for the 1932 Summer Olympics Olympics Category:1932 in the United States Summer Olympic 1932 Summer Olympic 1932 Category:20th century in Los Angeles, California
title: 1932 Summer Olympics
